◆ CheckIfScriptsInDatabaseExist()

void ScriptMgr::CheckIfScriptsInDatabaseExist ( )
190{
191 for (auto const& scriptName : sObjectMgr->GetScriptNames())
192 {
193 if (uint32 sid = sObjectMgr->GetScriptId(scriptName))
194 {
195 if (!ScriptRegistry<SpellScriptLoader>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
196 !ScriptRegistry<ServerScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
197 !ScriptRegistry<WorldScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
198 !ScriptRegistry<FormulaScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
199 !ScriptRegistry<WorldMapScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
200 !ScriptRegistry<InstanceMapScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
201 !ScriptRegistry<BattlegroundMapScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
202 !ScriptRegistry<ItemScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
203 !ScriptRegistry<CreatureScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
204 !ScriptRegistry<GameObjectScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
205 !ScriptRegistry<AreaTriggerScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
206 !ScriptRegistry<BattlegroundScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
207 !ScriptRegistry<OutdoorPvPScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
208 !ScriptRegistry<CommandScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
209 !ScriptRegistry<WeatherScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
210 !ScriptRegistry<AuctionHouseScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
211 !ScriptRegistry<ConditionScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
212 !ScriptRegistry<VehicleScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
213 !ScriptRegistry<DynamicObjectScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
214 !ScriptRegistry<TransportScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
215 !ScriptRegistry<AchievementCriteriaScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
216 !ScriptRegistry<PlayerScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
217 !ScriptRegistry<GuildScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
218 !ScriptRegistry<BGScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
219 !ScriptRegistry<AchievementScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
220 !ScriptRegistry<ArenaTeamScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
221 !ScriptRegistry<SpellSC>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
222 !ScriptRegistry<MiscScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
223 !ScriptRegistry<PetScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
224 !ScriptRegistry<CommandSC>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
225 !ScriptRegistry<ArenaScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
226 !ScriptRegistry<GroupScript>::GetScriptById(sid) &&
227 !ScriptRegistry<DatabaseScript>::GetScriptById(sid))
228 {
229 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Script named '{}' is assigned in the database, but has no code!", scriptName);
230 }
231 }
232 }
233}

◆ CreateAuraScripts()

void ScriptMgr::CreateAuraScripts ( uint32  spellId,
std::list< AuraScript * > &  scriptVector 
)
44{
45 SpellScriptsBounds bounds = sObjectMgr->GetSpellScriptsBounds(spellId);
46
47 for (SpellScriptsContainer::iterator itr = bounds.first; itr != bounds.second; ++itr)
48 {
49 SpellScriptLoader* tempScript = ScriptRegistry<SpellScriptLoader>::GetScriptById(itr->second);
50 if (!tempScript)
51 continue;
52
53 AuraScript* script = tempScript->GetAuraScript();
54
55 if (!script)
56 continue;
57
58 script->_Init(&tempScript->GetName(), spellId);
59
60 scriptVector.push_back(script);
61 }
62}
SpellScriptsBounds
std::pair< SpellScriptsContainer::iterator, SpellScriptsContainer::iterator > SpellScriptsBounds

◆ CreateSpellScriptLoaders()

void ScriptMgr::CreateSpellScriptLoaders ( uint32  spellId,
std::vector< std::pair< SpellScriptLoader *, std::multimap< uint32, uint32 >::iterator > > &  scriptVector 
)
65{
66 SpellScriptsBounds bounds = sObjectMgr->GetSpellScriptsBounds(spellId);
67 scriptVector.reserve(std::distance(bounds.first, bounds.second));
68
69 for (SpellScriptsContainer::iterator itr = bounds.first; itr != bounds.second; ++itr)
70 {
71 SpellScriptLoader* tempScript = ScriptRegistry<SpellScriptLoader>::GetScriptById(itr->second);
72 if (!tempScript)
73 continue;
74
75 scriptVector.emplace_back(tempScript, itr);
76 }
77}

References ScriptRegistry< TScript >::GetScriptById(), and sObjectMgr.

◆ CreateSpellScripts()

void ScriptMgr::CreateSpellScripts ( uint32  spellId,
std::list< SpellScript * > &  scriptVector 
)
23{
24 SpellScriptsBounds bounds = sObjectMgr->GetSpellScriptsBounds(spellId);

26 for (SpellScriptsContainer::iterator itr = bounds.first; itr != bounds.second; ++itr)

◆ DealDamage()

uint32 ScriptMgr::DealDamage ( Unit *  AttackerUnit,
Unit *  pVictim,
uint32  damage,
DamageEffectType  damagetype 
)
53{
54 if (ScriptRegistry<UnitScript>::ScriptPointerList.empty())
55 {
56 return damage;
57 }
58
59 for (auto const& [scriptID, script] : ScriptRegistry<UnitScript>::ScriptPointerList)
60 {
61 auto const& dmg = script->DealDamage(AttackerUnit, pVictim, damage, damagetype);
62 if (dmg != damage)
63 {
64 return damage;
65 }
66 }
67
68 return damage;
69}

◆ FillSpellSummary()

void ScriptMgr::FillSpellSummary ( )
236{
237 UnitAI::FillAISpellInfo();
238
239 SpellSummary = new TSpellSummary[sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfoStoreSize()];
240
241 SpellInfo const* pTempSpell;
242
243 for (uint32 i = 0; i < sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfoStoreSize(); ++i)
244 {
245 SpellSummary[i].Effects = 0;
246 SpellSummary[i].Targets = 0;
247
248 pTempSpell = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(i);
249 // This spell doesn't exist.
250 if (!pTempSpell)
251 continue;
252
253 for (uint32 j = 0; j < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++j)
254 {
255 // Spell targets self.
256 if (pTempSpell->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_UNIT_CASTER)
257 SpellSummary[i].Targets |= 1 << (SELECT_TARGET_SELF - 1);
258
259 // Spell targets a single enemy.
260 if (pTempSpell->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_UNIT_TARGET_ENEMY ||
261 pTempSpell->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_DEST_TARGET_ENEMY)
262 SpellSummary[i].Targets |= 1 << (SELECT_TARGET_SINGLE_ENEMY - 1);
263
264 // Spell targets AoE at enemy.
265 if (pTempSpell->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_UNIT_SRC_AREA_ENEMY ||
266 pTempSpell->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_UNIT_DEST_AREA_ENEMY ||
267 pTempSpell->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_SRC_CASTER ||
268 pTempSpell->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_DEST_DYNOBJ_ENEMY)
269 SpellSummary[i].Targets |= 1 << (SELECT_TARGET_AOE_ENEMY - 1);
270
271 // Spell targets an enemy.
272 if (pTempSpell->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_UNIT_TARGET_ENEMY ||
273 pTempSpell->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_DEST_TARGET_ENEMY ||
274 pTempSpell->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_UNIT_SRC_AREA_ENEMY ||
275 pTempSpell->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_UNIT_DEST_AREA_ENEMY ||
276 pTempSpell->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_SRC_CASTER ||
277 pTempSpell->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_DEST_DYNOBJ_ENEMY)
278 SpellSummary[i].Targets |= 1 << (SELECT_TARGET_ANY_ENEMY - 1);
279
280 // Spell targets a single friend (or self).
281 if (pTempSpell->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_UNIT_CASTER ||
282 pTempSpell->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_UNIT_TARGET_ALLY ||
283 pTempSpell->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_UNIT_TARGET_PARTY)
284 SpellSummary[i].Targets |= 1 << (SELECT_TARGET_SINGLE_FRIEND - 1);
285
286 // Spell targets AoE friends.
287 if (pTempSpell->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_AREA_PARTY ||
288 pTempSpell->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_UNIT_LASTTARGET_AREA_PARTY ||
289 pTempSpell->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_SRC_CASTER)
290 SpellSummary[i].Targets |= 1 << (SELECT_TARGET_AOE_FRIEND - 1);
291
292 // Spell targets any friend (or self).
293 if (pTempSpell->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_UNIT_CASTER ||
294 pTempSpell->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_UNIT_TARGET_ALLY ||
295 pTempSpell->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_UNIT_TARGET_PARTY ||
296 pTempSpell->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_UNIT_CASTER_AREA_PARTY ||
297 pTempSpell->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_UNIT_LASTTARGET_AREA_PARTY ||
298 pTempSpell->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_SRC_CASTER)
299 SpellSummary[i].Targets |= 1 << (SELECT_TARGET_ANY_FRIEND - 1);
300
301 // Make sure that this spell includes a damage effect.
302 if (pTempSpell->Effects[j].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_SCHOOL_DAMAGE ||
303 pTempSpell->Effects[j].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_INSTAKILL ||
304 pTempSpell->Effects[j].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_ENVIRONMENTAL_DAMAGE ||
305 pTempSpell->Effects[j].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_HEALTH_LEECH)
306 SpellSummary[i].Effects |= 1 << (SELECT_EFFECT_DAMAGE - 1);
307
308 // Make sure that this spell includes a healing effect (or an apply aura with a periodic heal).
309 if (pTempSpell->Effects[j].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_HEAL ||
310 pTempSpell->Effects[j].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_HEAL_MAX_HEALTH ||
311 pTempSpell->Effects[j].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_HEAL_MECHANICAL ||
312 (pTempSpell->Effects[j].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_AURA && pTempSpell->Effects[j].ApplyAuraName == 8))
313 SpellSummary[i].Effects |= 1 << (SELECT_EFFECT_HEALING - 1);
314
315 // Make sure that this spell applies an aura.
316 if (pTempSpell->Effects[j].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_AURA)
317 SpellSummary[i].Effects |= 1 << (SELECT_EFFECT_AURA - 1);
318 }
319 }
320}
SELECT_TARGET_ANY_FRIEND
@ SELECT_TARGET_ANY_FRIEND
Definition CreatureAI.h:51
SELECT_TARGET_AOE_FRIEND
@ SELECT_TARGET_AOE_FRIEND

◆ GetChatCommands()

Acore::ChatCommands::ChatCommandTable ScriptMgr::GetChatCommands ( )
23{
24 Acore::ChatCommands::ChatCommandTable table;
25
26 for (auto const& [scriptID, script] : ScriptRegistry<CommandScript>::ScriptPointerList)
27 {
28 Acore::ChatCommands::ChatCommandTable cmds = script->GetCommands();
29 std::move(cmds.begin(), cmds.end(), std::back_inserter(table));
30 }
31
32 return table;
33}

◆ GetCreatureAI()

CreatureAI * ScriptMgr::GetCreatureAI ( Creature *  creature)
157{
158 ASSERT(creature);
159
160 auto retAI = GetReturnAIScript<AllCreatureScript, CreatureAI>([creature](AllCreatureScript* script)
161 {
162 return script->GetCreatureAI(creature);
163 });
164
165 if (retAI)
166 {
167 return retAI;
168 }
169
170 auto tempScript = ScriptRegistry<CreatureScript>::GetScriptById(creature->GetScriptId());
171 return tempScript ? tempScript->GetAI(creature) : nullptr;
172}

◆ LoadDatabase()

void ScriptMgr::LoadDatabase ( )
160{
161 uint32 oldMSTime = getMSTime();
162
163 sScriptSystemMgr->LoadScriptWaypoints();
164
165 // Add all scripts that must be loaded after db/maps
166 ScriptRegistry<WorldMapScript>::AddALScripts();
167 ScriptRegistry<BattlegroundMapScript>::AddALScripts();
168 ScriptRegistry<InstanceMapScript>::AddALScripts();
169 ScriptRegistry<SpellScriptLoader>::AddALScripts();
170 ScriptRegistry<ItemScript>::AddALScripts();
171 ScriptRegistry<CreatureScript>::AddALScripts();
172 ScriptRegistry<GameObjectScript>::AddALScripts();
173 ScriptRegistry<AreaTriggerScript>::AddALScripts();
174 ScriptRegistry<BattlegroundScript>::AddALScripts();
175 ScriptRegistry<OutdoorPvPScript>::AddALScripts();
176 ScriptRegistry<WeatherScript>::AddALScripts();
177 ScriptRegistry<ConditionScript>::AddALScripts();
178 ScriptRegistry<TransportScript>::AddALScripts();
179 ScriptRegistry<AchievementCriteriaScript>::AddALScripts();
180
181 FillSpellSummary();
182
183 CheckIfScriptsInDatabaseExist();
184
185 LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded {} C++ scripts in {} ms", GetScriptCount(), GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
186 LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
187}
sScriptSystemMgr
#define sScriptSystemMgr

◆ OnAreaTrigger()

bool ScriptMgr::OnAreaTrigger ( Player *  player,
AreaTrigger const *  trigger 
)
25{
26 ASSERT(player);
27 ASSERT(trigger);
28
29 auto ret = IsValidBoolScript<ElunaScript>([&](ElunaScript* script)
30 {
31 return script->CanAreaTrigger(player, trigger);
32 });
33
34 if (ret && *ret)
35 {
36 return false;
37 }
38
39 auto tempScript = ScriptRegistry<AreaTriggerScript>::GetScriptById(sObjectMgr->GetAreaTriggerScriptId(trigger->entry));
40 return tempScript ? tempScript->OnTrigger(player, trigger) : false;
41}
ElunaScript
Definition ElunaScript.h:24
ElunaScript::CanAreaTrigger
virtual bool CanAreaTrigger(Player *, AreaTrigger const *)
Definition ElunaScript.h:39

◆ OnBeforeSetBossState()

void ScriptMgr::OnBeforeSetBossState ( uint32  id,
EncounterState  newState,
EncounterState  oldState,
Map *  instance 
)

Called when any raid boss has their state updated (e.g. pull, reset, kill).

Careful checks for old- and newState are required, since it can fire multiple times and not only when combat starts/ends.

Parameters
idThe id of the boss in the [instance]
newStateThe new boss state to be applied to this boss
oldStateThe previously assigned state of this boss
instanceA pointer to the [map] object of the instance
132{
133 CALL_ENABLED_HOOKS(GlobalScript, GLOBALHOOK_ON_BEFORE_SET_BOSS_STATE, script->OnBeforeSetBossState(id, newState, oldState, instance));
134}
GLOBALHOOK_ON_BEFORE_SET_BOSS_STATE
@ GLOBALHOOK_ON_BEFORE_SET_BOSS_STATE
Definition GlobalScript.h:48
GlobalScript::OnBeforeSetBossState
virtual void OnBeforeSetBossState(uint32, EncounterState, EncounterState, Map *)
Definition GlobalScript.h:101

References CALL_ENABLED_HOOKS, GLOBALHOOK_ON_BEFORE_SET_BOSS_STATE, instance(), and GlobalScript::OnBeforeSetBossState().

◆ OnCreateMap()

void ScriptMgr::OnCreateMap ( Map *  map)
88{
89 ASSERT(map);
90
91 CALL_ENABLED_HOOKS(AllMapScript, ALLMAPHOOK_ON_CREATE_MAP, script->OnCreateMap(map));
92
93 ForeachMaps<WorldMapScript>(map,
94 [&](WorldMapScript* script)
95 {
96 script->OnCreate(map);
97 });
98
99 ForeachMaps<InstanceMapScript>(map,
100 [&](InstanceMapScript* script)
101 {
102 script->OnCreate((InstanceMap*)map);
103 });
104
105 ForeachMaps<BattlegroundMapScript>(map,
106 [&](BattlegroundMapScript* script)
107 {
108 script->OnCreate((BattlegroundMap*)map);
109 });
110}
ALLMAPHOOK_ON_CREATE_MAP
@ ALLMAPHOOK_ON_CREATE_MAP
Definition AllMapScript.h:30
AllMapScript::OnCreateMap
virtual void OnCreateMap(Map *)
This hook called before creating map.
Definition AllMapScript.h:82
BattlegroundMapScript
Definition BattlegroundMapScript.h:24
BattlegroundMap
Definition Map.h:851
InstanceMapScript
Definition InstanceMapScript.h:24
InstanceMap
Definition Map.h:817
MapScript::OnCreate
virtual void OnCreate(TMap *)
Definition ScriptObject.h:95
WorldMapScript
Definition WorldMapScript.h:24

References ALLMAPHOOK_ON_CREATE_MAP, ASSERT, CALL_ENABLED_HOOKS, MapScript< TMap >::OnCreate(), and AllMapScript::OnCreateMap().

◆ OnCreatureUpdate()

void ScriptMgr::OnCreatureUpdate ( Creature *  creature,
uint32  diff 
)
184{
185 ASSERT(creature);
186
187 ExecuteScript<AllCreatureScript>([&](AllCreatureScript* script)
188 {
189 script->OnAllCreatureUpdate(creature, diff);
190 });
191
192 if (auto tempScript = ScriptRegistry<CreatureScript>::GetScriptById(creature->GetScriptId()))
193 {
194 tempScript->OnUpdate(creature, diff);
195 }
196}

◆ OnCriteriaCheck()

bool ScriptMgr::OnCriteriaCheck ( uint32  scriptId,
Player *  source,
Unit *  target,
uint32  criteria_id 
)
22{
23 ASSERT(source);
24 // target can be nullptr.
25
26 auto tempScript = ScriptRegistry<AchievementCriteriaScript>::GetScriptById(scriptId);
27 return tempScript ? tempScript->OnCheck(source, target, criteria_id) : false;
28}

References ASSERT, and ScriptRegistry< TScript >::GetScriptById().

◆ OnDestroyMap()

void ScriptMgr::OnDestroyMap ( Map *  map)
113{
114 ASSERT(map);
115
116 CALL_ENABLED_HOOKS(AllMapScript, ALLMAPHOOK_ON_DESTROY_MAP, script->OnDestroyMap(map));
117
118 ForeachMaps<WorldMapScript>(map,
119 [&](WorldMapScript* script)
120 {
121 script->OnDestroy(map);
122 });
123
124 ForeachMaps<InstanceMapScript>(map,
125 [&](InstanceMapScript* script)
126 {
127 script->OnDestroy((InstanceMap*)map);
128 });
129
130 ForeachMaps<BattlegroundMapScript>(map,
131 [&](BattlegroundMapScript* script)
132 {
133 script->OnDestroy((BattlegroundMap*)map);
134 });
135}
ALLMAPHOOK_ON_DESTROY_MAP
@ ALLMAPHOOK_ON_DESTROY_MAP
Definition AllMapScript.h:31
AllMapScript::OnDestroyMap
virtual void OnDestroyMap(Map *)
This hook called before destroing map.
Definition AllMapScript.h:89

References ALLMAPHOOK_ON_DESTROY_MAP, ASSERT, CALL_ENABLED_HOOKS, MapScript< TMap >::OnDestroy(), and AllMapScript::OnDestroyMap().

166 ASSERT(go);

168 ExecuteScript<AllGameObjectScript>([&](AllGameObjectScript* script)
169 {
170 script->OnGameObjectModifyHealth(go, attackerOrHealer, change, spellInfo);
171 });
172
173 if (auto tempScript = ScriptRegistry<GameObjectScript>::GetScriptById(go->GetScriptId()))
174 {
175 tempScript->OnModifyHealth(go, attackerOrHealer, change, spellInfo);
176 }
177}

◆ OnGossipHello() [1/2]

bool ScriptMgr::OnGossipHello ( Player *  player,
Creature *  creature 
)
25{
26 ASSERT(player);
27 ASSERT(creature);
28
29 auto ret = IsValidBoolScript<AllCreatureScript>([&](AllCreatureScript* script)
30 {
31 return script->CanCreatureGossipHello(player, creature);
32 });
33
34 if (ret && *ret)
35 {
36 return true;
37 }
38
39 auto tempScript = ScriptRegistry<CreatureScript>::GetScriptById(creature->GetScriptId());
40 ClearGossipMenuFor(player);
41 return tempScript ? tempScript->OnGossipHello(player, creature) : false;
42}
ClearGossipMenuFor
void ClearGossipMenuFor(Player *player)
Definition ScriptedGossip.cpp:22

◆ OnInstall()

void ScriptMgr::OnInstall ( Vehicle *  veh)
23{
24 ASSERT(veh);
25 ASSERT(veh->GetBase()->IsCreature());
26
27 if (auto tempScript = ScriptRegistry<VehicleScript>::GetScriptById(veh->GetBase()->ToCreature()->GetScriptId()))
28 {
29 tempScript->OnInstall(veh);
30 }
31}

References ASSERT, Vehicle::GetBase(), Creature::GetScriptId(), Object::IsCreature(), and Object::ToCreature().

◆ OnItemExpire()

bool ScriptMgr::OnItemExpire ( Player *  player,
ItemTemplate const *  proto 
)
65{
66 ASSERT(player);
67 ASSERT(proto);
68
69 auto ret = IsValidBoolScript<AllItemScript>([&](AllItemScript* script)
70 {
71 return !script->CanItemExpire(player, proto);
72 });
73
74 if (ret && *ret)
75 {
76 return false;
77 }
78
79 auto tempScript = ScriptRegistry<ItemScript>::GetScriptById(proto->ScriptId);
80 return tempScript ? tempScript->OnExpire(player, proto) : false;
81}
AllItemScript::CanItemExpire
virtual bool CanItemExpire(Player *, ItemTemplate const *)
Definition AllItemScript.h:39

References ASSERT, AllItemScript::CanItemExpire(), ScriptRegistry< TScript >::GetScriptById(), and ItemTemplate::ScriptId.

◆ OnItemRemove()

bool ScriptMgr::OnItemRemove ( Player *  player,
Item *  item 
)
84{
85 ASSERT(player);
86 ASSERT(item);
87
88 auto ret = IsValidBoolScript<AllItemScript>([&](AllItemScript* script)
89 {
90 return !script->CanItemRemove(player, item);
91 });
92
93 if (ret && *ret)
94 {
95 return false;
96 }
97
98 auto tempScript = ScriptRegistry<ItemScript>::GetScriptById(item->GetScriptId());
99 return tempScript ? tempScript->OnRemove(player, item) : false;
100}
AllItemScript::CanItemRemove
virtual bool CanItemRemove(Player *, Item *)
Definition AllItemScript.h:36

References ASSERT, AllItemScript::CanItemRemove(), ScriptRegistry< TScript >::GetScriptById(), and Item::GetScriptId().

◆ OnItemUse()

bool ScriptMgr::OnItemUse ( Player *  player,
Item *  item,
SpellCastTargets const &  targets 
)
46{
47 ASSERT(player);
48 ASSERT(item);
49
50 auto ret = IsValidBoolScript<AllItemScript>([&](AllItemScript* script)
51 {
52 return script->CanItemUse(player, item, targets);
53 });
54
55 if (ret && *ret)
56 {
57 return true;
58 }
59

61 return tempScript ? tempScript->OnUse(player, item, targets) : false;

◆ OnLoadGridMap()

void ScriptMgr::OnLoadGridMap ( Map *  map,
GridMap *  gmap,
uint32  gx,
uint32  gy 
)
138{
139 ASSERT(map);
140 ASSERT(gmap);
141
142 ForeachMaps<WorldMapScript>(map,
143 [&](WorldMapScript* script)
144 {
145 script->OnLoadGridMap(map, gmap, gx, gy);
146 });
147
148 ForeachMaps<InstanceMapScript>(map,
149 [&](InstanceMapScript* script)
150 {
151 script->OnLoadGridMap((InstanceMap*)map, gmap, gx, gy);
152 });
153
154 ForeachMaps<BattlegroundMapScript>(map,
155 [&](BattlegroundMapScript* script)
156 {
157 script->OnLoadGridMap((BattlegroundMap*)map, gmap, gx, gy);
158 });
159}

244 ASSERT(map);
245
246 CALL_ENABLED_HOOKS(AllMapScript, ALLMAPHOOK_ON_MAP_UPDATE, script->OnMapUpdate(map, diff));
247
248 ForeachMaps<WorldMapScript>(map,
249 [&](WorldMapScript* script)
250 {
251 script->OnUpdate(map, diff);
252 });
253
254 ForeachMaps<InstanceMapScript>(map,
255 [&](InstanceMapScript* script)
256 {
257 script->OnUpdate((InstanceMap*)map, diff);
258 });
259
260 ForeachMaps<BattlegroundMapScript>(map,
261 [&](BattlegroundMapScript* script)
262 {
263 script->OnUpdate((BattlegroundMap*)map, diff);
264 });
265}
ALLMAPHOOK_ON_MAP_UPDATE
@ ALLMAPHOOK_ON_MAP_UPDATE
Definition AllMapScript.h:32

◆ OnPlayerEnterMap()

void ScriptMgr::OnPlayerEnterMap ( Map *  map,
Player *  player 
)
186{
187 ASSERT(map);
188 ASSERT(player);
189
190 CALL_ENABLED_HOOKS(AllMapScript, ALLMAPHOOK_ON_PLAYER_ENTER_ALL, script->OnPlayerEnterAll(map, player));
191
192 ExecuteScript<PlayerScript>([=](PlayerScript* script)
193 {
194 script->OnMapChanged(player);
195 });
196
197 ForeachMaps<WorldMapScript>(map,
198 [&](WorldMapScript* script)
199 {
200 script->OnPlayerEnter(map, player);
201 });
202
203 ForeachMaps<InstanceMapScript>(map,
204 [&](InstanceMapScript* script)
205 {
206 script->OnPlayerEnter((InstanceMap*)map, player);
207 });
208
209 ForeachMaps<BattlegroundMapScript>(map,
210 [&](BattlegroundMapScript* script)
211 {
212 script->OnPlayerEnter((BattlegroundMap*)map, player);
213 });
214}
ALLMAPHOOK_ON_PLAYER_ENTER_ALL
@ ALLMAPHOOK_ON_PLAYER_ENTER_ALL
Definition AllMapScript.h:26
AllMapScript::OnPlayerEnterAll
virtual void OnPlayerEnterAll(Map *, Player *)
This hook called when a player enters any Map.
Definition AllMapScript.h:48

◆ OnPlayerIsClass()

Optional< bool > ScriptMgr::OnPlayerIsClass ( Player const *  player,
Classes  playerClass,
ClassContext  context 
)
573{
574 if (ScriptRegistry<PlayerScript>::EnabledHooks[PLAYERHOOK_ON_PLAYER_IS_CLASS].empty())
575 return {};
576
577 for (auto const& script : ScriptRegistry<PlayerScript>::EnabledHooks[PLAYERHOOK_ON_PLAYER_IS_CLASS])
578 {
579 Optional<bool> scriptResult = script->OnPlayerIsClass(player, unitClass, context);
580 if (scriptResult)
581 return scriptResult;
582 }
583
584 return {};
585}
Optional
std::optional< T > Optional
Optional helper class to wrap optional values within.
Definition Optional.h:24
PLAYERHOOK_ON_PLAYER_IS_CLASS
@ PLAYERHOOK_ON_PLAYER_IS_CLASS
Definition PlayerScript.h:140

References PLAYERHOOK_ON_PLAYER_IS_CLASS.

◆ OnQuestAccept() [1/3]

bool ScriptMgr::OnQuestAccept ( Player *  player,
Creature *  creature,
Quest const *  quest 
)
84{
85 ASSERT(player);
86 ASSERT(creature);
87 ASSERT(quest);
88
89 auto ret = IsValidBoolScript<AllCreatureScript>([&](AllCreatureScript* script)
90 {
91 return script->CanCreatureQuestAccept(player, creature, quest);
92 });
93
94 if (ret && *ret)
95 {
96 return true;
97 }
98
99 auto tempScript = ScriptRegistry<CreatureScript>::GetScriptById(creature->GetScriptId());
100 ClearGossipMenuFor(player);
101 return tempScript ? tempScript->OnQuestAccept(player, creature, quest) : false;
102}
AllCreatureScript::CanCreatureQuestAccept
virtual bool CanCreatureQuestAccept(Player *, Creature *, Quest const *)
Definition AllCreatureScript.h:95

References ASSERT, AllCreatureScript::CanCreatureQuestAccept(), ClearGossipMenuFor(), ScriptRegistry< TScript >::GetScriptById(), and Creature::GetScriptId().

◆ OnUnloadGridMap()

void ScriptMgr::OnUnloadGridMap ( Map *  map,
GridMap *  gmap,
uint32  gx,
uint32  gy 
)
162{
163 ASSERT(map);
164 ASSERT(gmap);
165
166 ForeachMaps<WorldMapScript>(map,
167 [&](WorldMapScript* script)
168 {
169 script->OnUnloadGridMap(map, gmap, gx, gy);
170 });
171
172 ForeachMaps<InstanceMapScript>(map,
173 [&](InstanceMapScript* script)
174 {
175 script->OnUnloadGridMap((InstanceMap*)map, gmap, gx, gy);
176 });
177
178 ForeachMaps<BattlegroundMapScript>(map,
179 [&](BattlegroundMapScript* script)
180 {
181 script->OnUnloadGridMap((BattlegroundMap*)map, gmap, gx, gy);
182 });
183}
MapScript::OnUnloadGridMap
virtual void OnUnloadGridMap(TMap *, GridMap *, uint32, uint32)
Definition ScriptObject.h:104

References ASSERT, and MapScript< TMap >::OnUnloadGridMap().

◆ OnWeatherChange()

void ScriptMgr::OnWeatherChange ( Weather *  weather,
WeatherState  state,
float  grade 
)
24{
25 ASSERT(weather);
26
27 ExecuteScript<ElunaScript>([&](ElunaScript* script)
28 {
29 script->OnWeatherChange(weather, state, grade);
30 });
31
32 if (auto tempScript = ScriptRegistry<WeatherScript>::GetScriptById(weather->GetScriptId()))
33 {
34 tempScript->OnChange(weather, state, grade);
35 }
36}
ElunaScript::OnWeatherChange
virtual void OnWeatherChange(Weather *, WeatherState, float)
This hook called when the weather changes in the zone this script is associated with.

◆ OnWeatherUpdate()

void ScriptMgr::OnWeatherUpdate ( Weather *  weather,
uint32  diff 
)
39{
40 ASSERT(weather);
41
42 if (auto tempScript = ScriptRegistry<WeatherScript>::GetScriptById(weather->GetScriptId()))
43 {
44 tempScript->OnUpdate(weather, diff);
45 }
46}
